bill_title: revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That section 2 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR (3) Governor's Office of Economic Development Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$8,926,562" and insert "$17,003,531" Section 2. That section 21 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS (2) Mike Durfee State Prison Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$12,759,780" and insert "$6,711,624" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$7,434,184" and insert "$6,922,840" (3) State Penitentiary Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$20,059,664" and insert "$10,432,674" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$7,182,657" and insert "$7,353,717" (4) Women's Prison Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$4,527,284" and insert "$2,313,648" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$2,136,882" and insert "$2,051,121" (5) Pheasantland Industries Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$2,436,591" and insert "$3,558,113" (6) Inmate Services Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$3,189,385" and insert "$2,419,487" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$30,790,675" and insert "$23,840,834" (7) Parole Services Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$4,411,463" and insert "$2,698,531" (8) Juvenile Community Corrections Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$1,926,918" and insert "$1,376,551" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$10,356,033" and insert "$10,084,887" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$3,407,358" and insert "$3,497,740" Section 18. That section 22 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES (2) Developmental Disabilities Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$64,696,832" and insert "$61,883,526" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$96,838,890" and insert "$110,741,851" (3) South Dakota Developmental Center - Redfield Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$8,053,788" and insert "$6,606,475" Personal Services, Federal Funds, delete "$11,212,818" and insert "$10,775,452" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$2,255,764" and insert "$1,970,684" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$2,946,484" and insert "$3,047,032" (4) Long Term Services and Supports Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$92,742,571" and insert "$74,648,476" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$129,057,286" and insert "$132,134,958" (5) Rehabilitation Services Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$4,109,109" and insert "$3,862,251" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$13,471,987" and insert "$13,554,273" Section 19. That section 26 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: UNIFIED JUDICIAL SYSTEM (2) Unified Judicial System Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$42,829,767" and insert "$37,064,502" Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$5,836,811" and insert "$6,076,392" Section 20. That section 27 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: LEGISLATIVE BRANCH (1) Legislative Operations SLE, General Funds, delete "$7,151,638" and insert "$7,165,187" Section 21. That section 28 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: OFFICE OF THE ATTORNEY GENERAL (2) Criminal Investigation Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$1,691,545" and insert "$2,126,607" (3) Law Enforcement Training Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$127,448" and insert "$2,561,949" Section 22. That section 30 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: SECRETARY OF STATE (1) Secretary of State Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$1,212,492" and insert "$1,254,992" Section 23. That section 32 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: STATE AUDITOR (1) State Auditor Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$1,198,648" and insert "$1,225,148" Section 24. Adjust all totals accordingly in sections 1 to 23, inclusive, of this Act. Section 25. That chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended by adding thereto NEW SECTIONS to read: Section 42. The state treasurer shall transfer to the Health Care Trust Fund the sum of fifty million dollars ($50,000,000) from the state general fund. Section 43. The state treasurer shall transfer to the State IT Modernization Fund the sum of ten million dollars ($10,000,000) from the state general fund. Section 44. The state treasurer shall transfer to the State Aeronautics Fund the sum of four million dollars ($4,000,000) from the state general fund. Section 45. The state treasurer shall transfer to the State Fair Fund the sum of seven hundred twenty-one thousand five hundred eighty-two dollars ($721,582) from the state general fund. Section 26. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of Fiscal year 2021 may be carried over to fiscal year 2022 Section 27. This Act is effective June 28, 2021.

The state treasurer shall transfer to the Equal Access to Our Courts Fund the sum of $250,000 from the state general fund. Section 25. Adjust all totals accordingly in sections 1 to 23, inclusive, of this Act. Section 26. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of Fiscal year 2021 may be carried over to fiscal year 2022 Section 27. This Act is effective June 28, 2021.

ENTITLED An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That section 2 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: OFFICE OF THE GOVERNOR (3) Governor's Office of Economic Development Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$8,926,562" and insert "$17,003,531" Section 2. That section 3 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: BUREAU OF FINANCE AND MANAGEMENT (BFM) (5) Employee Compensation and Billing Pools Operating Expenses, General Funds, delete "$657,450" and insert "$1,770,983" Operating Expenses, Federal Funds, delete "$265,952" and insert "$1,118,684" Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$514,724" and insert "$2,270,972" Section 3. That section 4 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: BUREAU OF ADMINISTRATION (BOA) (1) Administrative Services Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$115,494" and insert "$117,538" (2) Central Services Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$19,227,474" and insert "$19,589,137" (3) State Engineer Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$299,526" and insert "$301,332" (7) Risk Management Administration - Informational Operating Expenses, Other Funds, delete "$3,465,427" and insert "$3,466,707" Section 4. That section 32 of chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended to read: STATE AUDITOR (1) State Auditor Personal Services, General Funds, delete "$1,198,648" and insert "$1,225,148" Section 24. That chapter 242 of the 2020 Session Laws be amended by adding thereto NEW SECTIONS to read: Section 42. The state treasurer shall transfer to the State IT Modernization Fund the sum of $10,000,000 from the state general fund. Section 43. The state treasurer shall transfer to the State Aeronautics Fund the sum of $4,000,000 from the state general fund. Section 44. The state treasurer shall transfer to the State Fair Fund the sum of $721,582 from the state general fund. Section 45. The state treasurer shall transfer to the Equal Access to Our Courts Fund the sum of $250,000 from the state general fund. Section 25. Adjust all totals accordingly in sections 1 to 23, inclusive, of this Act. Section 26. Funds appropriated by this Act which are unspent at the end of Fiscal year 2021 may be carried over to fiscal year 2022. Section 27. This Act is effective June 28, 2021. An Act to revise the General Appropriations Act for fiscal year 2021.
